1.title: The Evil Cook at The Shakespeare Pub
1.plot: Sean explores The Shakespeare pub in Manchester and meets Flecky Bennett to investigate claims dating back hundreds of years, about an evil chef that is haunting the pub. There is a twist to the story and all is not what it seems with the pubs history about how it arrived into Manchester.

2.title: Strange Things at Owd Betts
2.plot: Sean heads to Rochdale and investigates strange paranormal reports at Owd Betts. Something spooky lurks in the basement and it seems Sean is not alone as he investigates the main bar. With so many sightings of ghostly spirits at the pub, will they join the investigation tonight?

1.title: The Curse of the Pendle Witches - Part 1
1.plot: Sean heads deep into the Pendle Hills in search of the Pendle Witches that went to trial in 1612 and were hung for witchcraft. The investigation takes an unexpected twist with a stop at the New Inn, Pendles most haunted pub.

2.title: The Curse of the Pendle Witches - Part 2
2.plot: Sean continues his investigation of Pendle Hill and ventures even deeper into the hills. The night takes an unexpected turn with a dramatic ending, which he believes was caused by the witches.

3.title: Shadow Menace Haunting Morley Market - Part 1
3.plot: Sean heads to the town of Morley to investigate the infamous Morley Market. A place once bustling with people from years gone by, is now haunted by shadow figures and they appear to want to make themselves known.

4.title: Shadow Menace Haunting Morley Market - Part 2
4.plot: Sean continues the investigation at Morley Market and appears to be followed by a spirit person that wants to touch him and distract him from investigating certain parts of the main hall. Will he uncover who this spirit is?

5.title: Horror at Sandhole Cottage - Part 1
5.plot: Sean returns to his former haunted home. No tenant has ever been able to stay the full term. Sean wants to seek out the spirits once and for all, to finally find out what is haunting his former home.

6.title: Horror at Sandhole Cottage - Part 2
6.plot: Sean continues his investigation of Sandhole Cottage and appears to be in direct contact with the spirits that are haunting the tenants that come to live here. Will he finally get them to rest?

7.title: Opening the Book at Leeds Library - Part 1
7.plot: Sean delves deep and opens a new chapter for the Ghost Dimension Flying Solo series and investigates Leeds Library, to uncover what is haunting and frightening the staff that work here.

8.title: Closing the Book at Leeds Library - Part 2
8.plot: Sean continues his investigation at Leeds Library and attempts to communicate with a spirit known by the name of Sternberg. Will his investigation have a happy ending?

9.title: Secret Spirits at the Old Market Tavern - Part 1
9.plot: Sean heads to Altrincham, Greater Manchester to investigate The Old Market Tavern. Once used as a coaching inn and a court house, many spirits still lurk here and Sean captures one of the most clearest EVP's ever. Prepare to explore another dimension.

10.title: Secret Spirits at the Old Market Tavern - Part 2
10.plot: Sean continues his paranormal investigation at The Old Market Tavern and he appears to have attracted the attention of spirit that launches a physical attack on him. Will he survive the night?

1.title: Digging Deep Astley Green Colliery Museum - Part 1
1.plot: Sean heads to Astley Green to the infamous Astley Green Colliery Museum. So many reports of paranormal activity have been confirmed at the mine, from lost miners to tormented souls and it appears Sean comes into direct contact with one of these lost souls during the investigation.

2.title: Digging Deep Astley Green Colliery Museum - Part 2
2.plot: Sean continues his investigation into Astley Green Colliery Museum and attempts to make further contact with the souls and spirits who have lost their lives here. Will he succeed?

3.title: Historic Hauntings of Whittington Castle - Part 1
3.plot: Sean heads to Oswestry to investigate claims of hauntings at a castle which is 1000's of years old. Believed to be haunted by an angry judge. Will any of the souls departed here, come out to play?

4.title: Historic Hauntings of Whittington Castle - Part 2
4.plot: Sean continues his investigation of the castle and attempts to make contact with the spirit world. It appears he is not alone on his investigation.

5.title: 14 Ghosts of The Bate Hall
5.plot: Sean heads to Macclesfield, Cheshire to investigate a building said to be haunted by 14 ghosts and also the lost soul of a witch. With so many spirits and one of the oldest public houses in the UK, will any of the ghosts join him tonight?

6.title: Haunting of the Sad Cavalier at the Ring O Bells - Part 1
6.plot: Sean heads to Middleton, Manchester to investigate claims that a sad cavalier named Edward is haunting this location. Ring O Bells has also been used for druid rituals. Will he be able to summon any spirits tonight?

7.title: Haunting of the Sad Cavalier at the Ring O Bells - Part 2
7.plot: As Sean continues his investigation at The Ring O Bells pub, he finds that out that there is more haunting this location, than just the spirits lurking behind the bar.

8.title: Ghostly Dimension at Ye Olde Boars Head
8.plot: Sean investigates one of the UK's most haunted pubs, with is very own dungeon. Haunted by multiple spirits, it appears to be very active and Sean is not prepared for what happens to Paul.

9.title: Poltergeist Haunting the Station Hotel - Part 1
9.plot: Sean heads to Ashton-Under-Lyne to investigate poltergeist activity claims in a truly local pub. Its believed that its not just the locals that return to haunt here. Sean comes face to face with the activity in a night he will never forget.

10.title: Poltergeist Haunting the Station Hotel - Part 2
10.plot: Sean continues his investigation at The Station Hotel and it appears his presence is not welcomed by the spirits. This is one experience of the paranormal that leaves a mark in Sean's memory forever.

1.title: Haunted escape room at Moviescape - Part 1
1.plot: Sean heads to a haunted escape room attraction and although the sets are dressed to scare, something more sinister seems to be lurking here. Will Sean escape unscathed tonight? Items from the Enfield haunting and Amityville haunting reside here, could they be causing havoc?

2.title: Haunted escape room at Moviescape - Part 2
2.plot: Sean continues his investigation of the escape rooms and investigates the haunted bible and radio. Prepare for a fright when Sean and Paul join forces and witness paranormal activity first hand.

3.title: Spirits in command at Welkin Mill
3.plot: Sean heads into Stockport, Greater Manchester and travels to Welkin Mill. He investigates claims of paranormal activity which also appear to be linked to his previous investigation of Moviescape. It turns out to be a very active night with the spirits seemingly in control.

4.title: Will it all go pear shaped at Pear Mill? - Part 1
4.plot: Sean heads to Stockport to investigate a haunted mill, which has a lift with a mind all of its own. Will any of the ghosts haunting the mill join him on the investigation tonight or will it all go pear shaped?

5.title: Will it all go pear shaped at Pear Mill? - Pear 2
5.plot: Sean continues his investigation of the mill and is attacked by a spirit. Jane joins the investigation with surprising results. Will it have a happy ending?

6.title: Forgotton Souls of Errwood Hall
6.plot: Sean heads to the Errwood Hall ruins in the Goyt Valley. Said to be haunted by 3 spirits and has its very own time slip. The investigation does not disappoint and although the hall has now gone, it appears that the spirits have not.

7.title: Escape the Escape Room - Part 1
7.plot: Sean enters one of the UK's most haunted escape rooms and it appears that he is not the only one trying to escape. Will the spirits play games with him tonight?

8.title: Escape the Escape Room - Part 2
8.plot: The investigation continues at the escape room and a certain spirit attempts to tug at Sean's clothing. Will he finally survive the escape room?

9.title: Lock Keepers Haunting at Lock 91
9.plot: Sean heads to Manchester to investigate a lock keepers cottage that was built in 1804 and it appears that the spirits are still watching over the building and terrifying its customers.

10.title: Lights Out at Abbey House Museum - Part 1
10.plot: Sean heads to Leeds and investigates Abbey House Museum. A maze of Victorian streets and shops. Who will he bump into tonight and what secrets does this location hold?

11.title: Lights Out at Abbey House Museum - Part 2
11.plot: Sean continues his investigation at Abbey House Museum and ventures outside into the monastery ruins. Will he find the ghostly monk tonight?

imdb.plot outline: Join Sean as he investigates the UK's most haunted paranormal locations. Witches, demons and lost souls are what he intends to seek out. Ghost hunting taken to the edge with dramatic results. What you see and hear is what happened on every location and Sean will take you on his journey through the Ghost Dimension.
imdb.title: Ghost Dimension Flying Solo
plot: Join Sean as he investigates the UK's most haunted paranormal locations. Witches, demons and lost souls are what he intends to seek out. Ghost hunting taken to the edge with dramatic results. What you see and hear is what happened on every location and Sean will take you on his journey through the Ghost Dimension.::Sean Reynolds
